This is an amazing experience. Even after 11 years this game is fascinating. You never going to get bored because of workshop maps and tests , but also because of the gameplay. Definetly recommended, bro just play it.
一定要入手这款游戏，比前作好玩很多。除了最基本的传送门元素，还加了各种凝胶。本作的剧情也很扣人心弦，尤其是最后的一段动画，非常震撼。另外，玩家还可以自己制造实验室自己玩，也别有一番乐趣。总之，这款游戏性价比超高，打折只要3人民币，为什么不买呢？
buy this or your life will forever remain worse than mine in every aspect

[h1] A master piece [/h1] 
The best game made by valve, must by. A game for everybody. 

[h1] Whats missing[/h1] 
The game is super short, the singleplayer alone takes around 10 hours on the first playtrough, and the coop like 8 hours, i have a lot of hours since i enjoy speedruning

[h1] replayability [/h1]
The game has a mode for people to create maps which i think is indeed really good

[h1] story [/h1]
The story is indeed amazing.A really good story, [spoiler] glados in the final part coming along, and weathley being the bad guy [/spoiler] 

[h1] conclusion [/h1]
I think its worth buying, but i will wait for discounts since there tends to be many.

You're still here? There's nothing else to say. I mean. What else would I even say? It's a good game. Get it.
A very nice and challenging game, I just really wish Valve would make a third one.
This game is ahead of its time. Very great.

This is an extraordinary game for any demographic! I got lost and confused every so often, but I never gave up. The game is difficult at times, but that is just another part of the fun. It has incredible level designs, an amazing co-op system, and even a community testing chamber creator. I recommend playing this game as well as its predecessor, Portal.
Long live Aperture Science. Long live Portal 2.

One of the greatest games of all time

An utter, roaring classic that's tremendous fun playing through the wickedly written solo campaign or taking on the co-operative game with a good friend (there can be few pleasures in life as guilty as dropping somebody accidentally-on-purpose from a light bridge to their deaths).  It has continued replay value too thanks to the community built levels ... if you're one of the rare folks out there who hasn't yet played this, it's a no-brainer. Buy. Play. Best puzzle game ever.
Cuando uno pensaba que el primer juego no podía ser mejor llega Portal 2 y añade más mecánicas y tiempo de juego, logrando ser incluso más divertido que su predecesor.
